DATA_RECORD.description: OK. I, uh, admit that I went a little crazy with the party prep, but I swear I did NOT blow up those balloons. Pop those pests and the Second Fleet Master will hook you up with armor spheres!

DATA_RECORD.name: Briga de Balões
DATA_RECORD.description: Certo. Eu, hã, admito que exagerei um pouco na preparação da festa, mas juro que NÃO estourei aqueles balões. Acabe com aquelas pragas e o Mestre da Segunda Frota vai te arranjar umas esferas de armadura!

DATA_RECORD.name: Talk About a Party Foul...
DATA_RECORD.description: Wooo, that was one GNARLY party! But some, uh, party pooper left all his party poop all over the place... Sorry, Player. Someone's gotta clean up this mess and it ain't me! But if you do, the Second Fleet Master will hook you up with some sweet armor spheres!

DATA_RECORD.name: Que Estraga-festa...
DATA_RECORD.description: Nossa, essa festa foi INTENSA! Mas, hã, um penetra deixou tudo bagunçado... Desculpa, fera. Alguém precisa dar uma limpada, e eu não tô a fim! Mas se você quebrar esse galho, o Mestre da Segunda Frota vai te arranjar umas esferas de armadura da hora!

DATA_RECORD.name: The Proving
DATA_RECORD.description: We've waited so long for this day. It's time for you to participate in the Proving and become a true brave. Offer your trophy to the All-Mother, and you shall be blessed generously.

DATA_RECORD.name: A Provação
DATA_RECORD.description: Aguardamos tanto esse dia. Chegou a hora de você participar da Provação e se tornar uma verdadeira Valente. Ofereça seu troféu à Mãe-de-Todos e você será abençoada.

DATA_RECORD.name: Lessons of the Wild
DATA_RECORD.description: It's time for some special training. Wingdrakes are feeble things compared to larger monsters, but even they can take down a hunter. Cull their numbers and we'll prep some new Palico gear.

DATA_RECORD.name: Lições da Natureza
DATA_RECORD.description: Hora de treinar. Dracoalados são frágeis se comparados com monstros maiores, mas podem derrubar um caçador. Reduza a população deles e faremos um equipamento de Amigato novo.

DATA_RECORD.name: The Heart of the Nora
DATA_RECORD.description: No...Mother's Heart! The survivors hiding inside the mountain will be buried if you don't take down those monsters. Overcome this threat and I will provide you with special equipment!

DATA_RECORD.name: O Coração de Nora
DATA_RECORD.description: Não... Pelo Coração de uma Mãe! Os sobreviventes dentro da montanha serão soterrados se você não eliminar esses monstros. Acabe com eles e eu lhe darei um equipamento especial!

DATA_RECORD.name: Arena Master Quest 01
DATA_RECORD.description: In the monster corner: Banbaro, the Ruler of the Reach, the Champ of Tramp! If you can't dig your own grave, he'll dig it for you! You ready to duke it out with set weapons and armor?

DATA_RECORD.name: Missão Mestre da Arena 01
DATA_RECORD.description: No canto dos monstros: Banbaro, o Senhor da Fronteira, o Campeão Chifrudo! Se você não cavar sua cova, ele cava por você! Consegue encará-lo com armas e armadura fixas?

DATA_RECORD.name: Arena Master Quest 02
DATA_RECORD.description: In the monster corner: Nightshade Paolumu, the Sultan of Slumber, the Flightmare! Get caught in the sleeper hold, and it's lights out! You ready to duke it out with set weapons and armor?

DATA_RECORD.name: Missão Mestre da Arena 02
DATA_RECORD.description: No canto dos monstros: Paolumu Beladona, o Sultão do Sono, o Pesadelo Alado! Caia nas garras dele e vai apagar na hora! Consegue encará-lo com armas e armadura fixas?

DATA_RECORD.name: Arena Master Quest 03
DATA_RECORD.description: In the monster corner: Nargacuga, the Shadowy Slayer, the Nimble Ninja! If you can't see him, it's already too late! You ready to duke it out with set weapons and armor?

DATA_RECORD.name: Missão Mestre da Arena 03
DATA_RECORD.description: No canto dos monstros: Nargacuga, o Assassino Sombrio, o Ninja Ágil! Se você não conseguir vê-lo, já é tarde demais! Consegue encará-lo com armas e armadura fixas?

DATA_RECORD.name: Arena Master Quest 04
DATA_RECORD.description: In the monster corner: Acidic Glavenus, the Colonel of Corrosion, The Dino Dueler! There's no stoppin' once he gets to choppin'! You ready to duke it out with set weapons and armor?

DATA_RECORD.name: Missão Mestre da Arena 04
DATA_RECORD.description: No canto dos monstros: Glavenus Ácido, o Coronel Corrosivo, o Dino Duelista! Quando ele começa a cortar, não para mais! Consegue encará-lo com armas e armadura fixas?

DATA_RECORD.name: Arena Master Quest 05
DATA_RECORD.description: In the monster corner: An Odogaron-Ebony Odogaron tag team! The hounds are out, and you're about to get woofed! You ready to duke it out with set weapons and armor?

DATA_RECORD.name: Missão Mestre da Arena 05
DATA_RECORD.description: No canto dos monstros: a dupla Odogaron e Odogaron Negro! A cachorrada tá à solta e vai morder todo mundo! Consegue encará-los com armas e armadura fixas?

DATA_RECORD.name: Arena Master Quest 06
DATA_RECORD.description: In the monster corner: Zinogre, the Bug Zapper, the Thunder Clapper! When this pup gets to howlin', better throw the towel in! You ready to duke it out with set weapons and armor?

DATA_RECORD.name: Missão Mestre da Arena 06
DATA_RECORD.description: No canto dos monstros: Zinogre, o Eletrizador de Insetos, o Monstrão do Trovão! O uivo dele vai mexer com seus nervos! Consegue encará-lo com armas e armadura fixas?

DATA_RECORD.name: Arena Master Quest 07
DATA_RECORD.description: In the monster corner: A Tigrex-Brute Tigrex tag team! Don't get between these two, unless you wanna be a wishbone! You ready to duke it out with set weapons and armor?

DATA_RECORD.name: Missão Mestre da Arena 07
DATA_RECORD.description: No canto dos monstros: a dupla Tigrex e Tigrex Bruto! Não fique entre esses dois ou vai virar ossinho da sorte! Consegue encará-los com armas e armadura fixas?

DATA_RECORD.name: Challenge Quest 1: MR Intermediate
DATA_RECORD.description: In the monster corner: A Tobi-Kadachi-Viper Tobi-Kadachi tag team! Stay on your toes against this tandem because the fur is about to fly! You ready to duke it out with set weapons and armor?

DATA_RECORD.name: Missão de Desafio 1: Intermed. RM
DATA_RECORD.description: No canto dos monstros: a dupla Tobi-Kadachi e Tobi-Kadachi Vípero! Fique alerta ao lutar com eles, pois vai voar pelo! Consegue encará-los com armas e armadura fixas?

DATA_RECORD.name: Challenge Quest 2: MR Intermediate
DATA_RECORD.description: In the monster corner: An Anjanath-Fulgur Anjanath tag...team...? Bless their hearts, I think their lil' ol' arms are too short to tag... You ready to duke it out with set weapons and armor?

DATA_RECORD.name: Missão de Desafio 2: Intermed. RM
DATA_RECORD.description: No canto dos monstros: a... dupla... Anjanath e Anjanath Fulgurante? Coitados, eles nem devem conseguir dar as mãos com esses bracinhos... Consegue encará-los com armas e armadura fixas?

DATA_RECORD.name: Challenge Quest 1: MR Expert
DATA_RECORD.description: In the monster corner: Yian Garuga, the Screamin' Demon, the Beaked Berzerker! You've never seen crazy like this before! You ready to duke it out with set weapons and armor?

DATA_RECORD.name: Missão de Desafio 1: Perito RM
DATA_RECORD.description: No canto dos monstros: Yian Garuga, o Demônio Estridente, o Bicador Bravo! Esse monstro é loucura pura! Consegue encará-lo com armas e armadura fixas?

DATA_RECORD.name: Challenge Quest 2: MR Expert
DATA_RECORD.description: In the monster corner: Deviljho, the food chain dominator, the pulverizing pickle! This is one hoss that likes to throw its weight around! You ready to duke it out with set weapons and armor?

DATA_RECORD.name: Missão de Desafio 2: Perito RM
DATA_RECORD.description: No canto dos monstros: Deviljho, o dominador da cadeia alimentar, o picles pulverizador! Taí um oponente de peso! Consegue encará-lo com armas e armadura fixas?

DATA_RECORD.name: A Fish to Whet Your Appetite
DATA_RECORD.description: Not only are those big boys sharp to a fault, if you can haul them here fresh as a daisy, they might be useful as a weapon too! So get on out there and snag some, will ya? (Special material rewards)

DATA_RECORD.name: A Fish to Whet Your Appetite
DATA_RECORD.description: Not only are those big boys sharp to a fault, if you can haul them here fresh as a daisy, they might be useful as a weapon too! So get on out there and snag some, will ya? (Special material rewards)

DATA_RECORD.name: Fetching Light Pearls
DATA_RECORD.description: I saw those Kelbi eyes glow like a pearl in the dark! Then it struck me. Yes, INSPIRATION! To the message boards! (Special material rewards)

DATA_RECORD.name: Fetching Light Pearls
DATA_RECORD.description: I saw those Kelbi eyes glow like a pearl in the dark! Then it struck me. Yes, INSPIRATION! To the message boards! (Special material rewards)

DATA_RECORD.name: To Our World
DATA_RECORD.description: Why is that thing still alive? I thought we killed it! Does that mean I'm in the...? At any rate, I need to find a way back to my world. In this quest, you will get to play as Artemis.

DATA_RECORD.name: To Our World
DATA_RECORD.description: Why is that thing still alive? I thought we killed it! Does that mean I'm in the...? At any rate, I need to find a way back to my world. In this quest, you will get to play as Artemis.

DATA_RECORD.name: The New World
DATA_RECORD.description: Looks like I'm back in this world again, but where are those two? Guess I better look for them... In this quest, you will get to play as Artemis.

DATA_RECORD.name: The New World
DATA_RECORD.description: Looks like I'm back in this world again, but where are those two? Guess I better look for them... In this quest, you will get to play as Artemis.

DATA_RECORD.name: Skyward Snipers
DATA_RECORD.description: You've seen those big Grandfather Mantagrells being all floaty in the air, right? My notes say they're especially weak to sudden shocks. I bet if you use your slinger you can get one for me to play with—I mean study, of course! (Special material rewards)

DATA_RECORD.name: Skyward Snipers
DATA_RECORD.description: You've seen those big Grandfather Mantagrells being all floaty in the air, right? My notes say they're especially weak to sudden shocks. I bet if you use your slinger you can get one for me to play with—I mean study, of course! (Special material rewards)

DATA_RECORD.name: Camoflawed
DATA_RECORD.description: The young miss I work with needs to research some critter in a Rath nest and almost went wearin' an herbivore disguise. Good thing I stopped her before she got swooped up. Could you go hunt that Rathian so she can get her critter fix? (Special material rewards)

DATA_RECORD.name: Camoflawed
DATA_RECORD.description: The young miss I work with needs to research some critter in a Rath nest and almost went wearin' an herbivore disguise. Good thing I stopped her before she got swooped up. Could you go hunt that Rathian so she can get her critter fix? (Special material rewards)

DATA_RECORD.name: Kadachi Twins
DATA_RECORD.description: It's so freakin' cold out here that I came up with a design for some warm armor based on a monster! It looks strong, yes, strong indeed! (Special material rewards)

DATA_RECORD.name: Kadachi Twins
DATA_RECORD.description: It's so freakin' cold out here that I came up with a design for some warm armor based on a monster! It looks strong, yes, strong indeed! (Special material rewards)

DATA_RECORD.name: Seeing is Believing
DATA_RECORD.description: Yo, Scrawny. This hungover hunter came by sayin' he's seein' things in the Arena. He was so shook up about it that it's made him quit drinkin'. Go check it out for him, will ya? (Special material rewards)

DATA_RECORD.name: Seeing is Believing
DATA_RECORD.description: Yo, Scrawny. This hungover hunter came by sayin' he's seein' things in the Arena. He was so shook up about it that it's made him quit drinkin'. Go check it out for him, will ya? (Special material rewards)

DATA_RECORD.name: The True Tyrant
DATA_RECORD.description: We salute all hunters who have conquered the New World using everything at their disposal. Embark on this quest that will challenge you and may the Sapphire Star light your way!

DATA_RECORD.name: The True Tyrant
DATA_RECORD.description: We salute all hunters who have conquered the New World using everything at their disposal. Embark on this quest that will challenge you and may the Sapphire Star light your way!

DATA_RECORD.name: The Assassin
DATA_RECORD.description: I dreamt of a man with the grace of an assassin...and ever since, I've been going bonkers thinking about what I want to work on next. Ya gotta help me out here! (Upgrades the Assassin's Hood upon first completion.)

DATA_RECORD.name: The Assassin
DATA_RECORD.description: I dreamt of a man with the grace of an assassin...and ever since, I've been going bonkers thinking about what I want to work on next. Ya gotta help me out here! (Upgrades the Assassin's Hood upon first completion.)

DATA_RECORD.name: USJ: Shine On Forever
DATA_RECORD.description: Special delivery from USJ to you: the perfect stage for you to sparkle with a monster that truly shines! May the shine never end! (Special material rewards)

DATA_RECORD.name: USJ: Shine On Forever
DATA_RECORD.description: Special delivery from USJ to you: the perfect stage for you to sparkle with a monster that truly shines! May the shine never end! (Special material rewards)

DATA_RECORD.name: The Conqueror of Hoarfrost
DATA_RECORD.description: We salute all hunters who have conquered the New World using everything at their disposal. Embark on this quest that will challenge you and may the Sapphire Star light your way!

DATA_RECORD.name: The Conqueror of Hoarfrost
DATA_RECORD.description: We salute all hunters who have conquered the New World using everything at their disposal. Embark on this quest that will challenge you and may the Sapphire Star light your way!

DATA_RECORD.name: A Star That Will Never Dim
DATA_RECORD.description: We salute all hunters who have conquered the New World using everything at their disposal. Embark on this quest that will challenge you and may the Sapphire Star light your way!

DATA_RECORD.name: A Star That Will Never Dim
DATA_RECORD.description: We salute all hunters who have conquered the New World using everything at their disposal. Embark on this quest that will challenge you and may the Sapphire Star light your way!

DATA_RECORD.name: Wearer of the Iceborne Crown
DATA_RECORD.description: We salute all hunters who have conquered the New World using everything at their disposal. Embark on this quest that will challenge you and may the Sapphire Star light your way!

DATA_RECORD.name: Wearer of the Iceborne Crown
DATA_RECORD.description: We salute all hunters who have conquered the New World using everything at their disposal. Embark on this quest that will challenge you and may the Sapphire Star light your way!

DATA_RECORD.name: USJ: Ballet of Frost
DATA_RECORD.description: Special delivery from USJ to you: the perfect stage for you to duel with a monster with fangs of frost! May the excitement never end! (Special material rewards)

DATA_RECORD.name: USJ: Ballet of Frost
DATA_RECORD.description: Special delivery from USJ to you: the perfect stage for you to duel with a monster with fangs of frost! May the excitement never end! (Special material rewards)

DATA_RECORD.name: Aiming for the Light
DATA_RECORD.description: We salute all hunters who have conquered the New World using everything at their disposal. Embark on this quest that will challenge you and may the Sapphire Star light your way!

DATA_RECORD.name: Aiming for the Light
DATA_RECORD.description: We salute all hunters who have conquered the New World using everything at their disposal. Embark on this quest that will challenge you and may the Sapphire Star light your way!

DATA_RECORD.name: All That Glitters is Furious
DATA_RECORD.description: We know of the Furious Rajang, but only just that. Do you know why? Because when it spots you, it's already over. Can our Sapphire Star stand up to the golden fury?

DATA_RECORD.name: All That Glitters is Furious
DATA_RECORD.description: We know of the Furious Rajang, but only just that. Do you know why? Because when it spots you, it's already over. Can our Sapphire Star stand up to the golden fury?

DATA_RECORD.name: Fear No Scars
DATA_RECORD.description: We salute all hunters who have conquered the New World using everything at their disposal. Embark on this quest that will challenge you and may the Sapphire Star light your way!

DATA_RECORD.name: Fear No Scars
DATA_RECORD.description: We salute all hunters who have conquered the New World using everything at their disposal. Embark on this quest that will challenge you and may the Sapphire Star light your way!

DATA_RECORD.name: Power and Technique
DATA_RECORD.description: We salute all hunters who have conquered the New World using everything at their disposal. Embark on this quest that will challenge you and may the Sapphire Star light your way!

DATA_RECORD.name: Power and Technique
DATA_RECORD.description: We salute all hunters who have conquered the New World using everything at their disposal. Embark on this quest that will challenge you and may the Sapphire Star light your way!

DATA_RECORD.name: Achy Brachy Heart
DATA_RECORD.description: My senior hunting friend went off to slay a Raging Brachydios once, and when I asked about it she just said, "I just don't think you'd understand." Can you believe that? I almost blew up at her! Now I have to go see it for myself.

DATA_RECORD.name: Achy Brachy Heart
DATA_RECORD.description: My senior hunting friend went off to slay a Raging Brachydios once, and when I asked about it she just said, "I just don't think you'd understand." Can you believe that? I almost blew up at her! Now I have to go see it for myself.
